name: Bluebook-signals-for-zotero
tagline: A simple plugin that adds a menu of standard Bluebook signals to the Prefix field of the Zotero/MLZ work procesor plugins.
body: This is a simple extension originally built for use with Multilingual Zotero and the MLZ legal styles (normally used in conjunction with the Abbreviation Filter plugin). Never mind the buttons above. The installer is here: Install When this plugin is installed, typing `Ctrl-s` in the *Prefix* field of the word processor plugins will open a drop-down listing of the standard Bluebook signals. Clicking on an item in the list will insert it into the field at the current cursor position. And, um, that's it.
